title: Welcome to Squeaky Clean Car Wash!
description: Thanks for signing up! Enjoy 10% off your first wash.

title: Rainy Day Special!
description: Get a free undercarriage wash with any premium wash today!

title: Your car is due for a wash!
description: It's been a while.  Schedule your next wash and save 5%.

title: New Ceramic Coating Available!
description: Protect your car's paint with our new ceramic coating service.

title: Feedback Requested!
description: Tell us about your recent visit and help us improve.

title: Loyalty Program Reminder
description: You're only 2 washes away from a free wash! Keep it clean!

title: Appointment Reminder
description: Your car wash appointment is scheduled for tomorrow at 9:00 AM.

title: Refer a Friend!
description: Give your friends a free wash and get one for yourself!

title: We're Open Late!
description: Get your car washed tonight - we're open until 9 PM.
